OptimizedBuffer.description: Optimized buffer for high-performance I/O with SIMD alignment

RingBuffer.description: Ring buffer for continuous streaming with zero-copy

OptimizedMinifyingParser.description: Optimized parser that processes input in larger chunks using SIMD

SimdUtils.description: SIMD utilities for high-performance JSON processing

PluginInterface.description: Plugin interface for all zmin plugins

RealSimdProcessor.description: Real SIMD intrinsics implementation for maximum performance

VectorizedClassifier.description: Vectorized character classification for JSON processing

HighPerformanceMinifier.description:
High-performance JSON minifier using SIMD optimizations
Target: 1-3 GB/s throughput with optimal memory usage

NumaHints.description: Performance hints based on NUMA topology

MemoryOptimizer.description: Memory bandwidth optimizer for high-performance JSON processing

AccessPatternAnalyzer.description: Memory access pattern analyzer for optimization insights

CacheOptimizedProcessor.description: Advanced cache-optimized JSON processor with prefetching

MemoryAccessAnalyzer.description: Memory access pattern analyzer for optimization

UltimateMinifier.description:
Ultimate high-performance JSON minifier combining all optimizations
Target: 4+ GB/s throughput with O(1) memory usage

MemoryProfiler.description: Memory profiler that tracks all allocations

ScopedProfiler.description: Scoped memory profiler for specific operations

PerformanceMetrics.description: Performance metrics for a minification operation

WorkStealingQueue.description: Lock-free work-stealing queue implementation optimized for JSON minification

AdvancedThreadPool.description: Advanced work-stealing thread pool with NUMA awareness

ParallelMinifier.description: Simple parallel minifier for basic multi-threaded JSON processing

OptimizedParallelMinifier.description: High-performance parallel minifier with optimal work distribution

OptimizedWorkStealer.description: Optimized work-stealing scheduler with improved efficiency

StreamingParallelMinifier.description:
Parallel minifier that processes JSON in a streaming fashion
Instead of splitting JSON into chunks, it parallelizes different aspects:
1. Reading/buffering
2. Parsing/minifying
3. Writing output

RecoveryResult.description: Recovery result after attempting a strategy

ResilientMinifier.description: Resilient minifier that automatically recovers from errors

TurboMinifier.description: Turbo minifier with automatic strategy selection

TurboStrategy.description: Interface that all turbo strategies must implement

MinifierInterface.description: Common interface for all minifier implementations
